detectors.description: Lotto.calculateWinner(uint256,uint256) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#47-70) uses a weak PRNG: "winningTicketIndex = decisionBlockHash % rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#57)"

Lotto.fallback() (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#131-160) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#141)

Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#89-113) ignores return value by winner.send(subpot) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#109)

Deprecated standard detected uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex)) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#116):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex))](../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#L116):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput
	- SkipEmptyStringLiteral
	- ConstantOptimizerSubtraction
	- IdentityPrecompileReturnIgnored
	- HighOrderByteCleanStorage
	- OptimizerStaleKnowledgeAboutSHA3
	- LibrariesNotCallableFromPayableFunctions.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.0 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#8)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#89-113):
	External calls:
	- winner.send(subpot) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#109)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].isCashed[subpotIndex] = true (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#111)

	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#146)

	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#150)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#153)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto.sol#154)
